channel.title: Scape Wars | Ironman Mode! | 10+ Quests | 40+ Achievements | 25+ Dungeons
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/zo95t.png[/img]
We are a brand new server, but don't let that stop you! We have thousands of registered players and 100s online!
[url=http://www.scapewars.com/]Home[/url] | [url=http://www.scapewars.com/forums]Forum[/url] | [url=http://www.scapewars.com/play]Play Now[/url] | [url=http://www.scapewars.com/register]Register[/url] | [url=http://www.scapewars.com/hiscores]Hiscores[/url]
We have many features and useful content for a variety of playing options. For one, we have regular mode (which will get you PKing quickly), or you can set your account as an ironman and play under a challenging self-sufficient mode.
Not only this, but we have Player Shops - create and manage your own shop, view shop lists, compare prices, and buy items from other players through their shop without them needing to be online.
Here is a general feature list, but of course there is much more you can discover simply by playing: • Ironman mode • x1000 combat XP for regular accounts • Best combat system in RSPS • PKing EP system to help make PKing more profitable • One of the top RSPS economies • Active Castle Wars with custom game modes • Clan Wars for Clan battles • Custom wilderness options: teleport out of view of players who aren't 1 or 30 defence (useful for stopping mains crashing pures) • Advanced settings for any style of RS appearance • 25+ dungeons for constant gameplay and new places • 10+ quests • 40+ achievements • Black Jack gambling • Social Slayer • Hiscores for regular accounts AND ironman accounts • Fight Cave • Fight Kiln • Dungeoneering • Duel Arena • Dominion Tower • Warriors Guild • Barrows • Mystery boxes • God Wars • Dagannoth Kings • King Black Dragon • Corporeal Beast • Chaos Elemental • Kalphite Queen • Tormented Demons • WildyWyrm • Bork • Phoenix • Pets • Bank tabs • Clan Chats • Ancient Curse prayers
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2r6332d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yKkWkeD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/verjvc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2rddit3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/kdq44k.png[/img]

[/quote]

We’ve only been online since the 22nd, so get started now!

Wat.[/quote]
Speaking from owning BattleScape and this server being based on that source
EDIT: Ah 22nd of last month

Read full topic

item.title: Scape Wars | Ironman Mode! | 10+ Quests | 40+ Achievements | 25+ Dungeons
item.dc:creator: @ScapeWars ScapeWars
item.description:
@ScapeWars wrote:

We are a brand new server, but don’t let that stop you! We have thousands of registered players and 100s online!

Home | Forum | Play Now | Register | Hiscores

We have many features and useful content for a variety of playing options. For one, we have regular mode (which will get you PKing quickly), or you can set your account as an ironman and play under a challenging self-sufficient mode.

Not only this, but we have Player Shops - create and manage your own shop, view shop lists, compare prices, and buy items from other players through their shop without them needing to be online.

Here is a general feature list, but of course there is much more you can discover simply by playing:
• Ironman mode
• x1000 combat XP for regular accounts
• Best combat system in RSPS
• PKing EP system to help make PKing more profitable
• One of the top RSPS economies
• Active Castle Wars with custom game modes
• Clan Wars for Clan battles
• Custom wilderness options: teleport out of view of players who aren’t 1 or 30 defence (useful for stopping mains crashing pures)
• Advanced settings for any style of RS appearance
• 25+ dungeons for constant gameplay and new places
• 10+ quests
• 40+ achievements
• Black Jack gambling
• Social Slayer
• Hiscores for regular accounts AND ironman accounts
• Fight Cave
• Fight Kiln
• Dungeoneering
• Duel Arena
• Dominion Tower
• Warriors Guild

• Mystery boxes
